rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming area with ample natural light from the floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area integrated with an open-plan layout and large windows to enhance brightness and ventilation, following Vastu principles by aligning with the east-west direction.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining space adjacent to the kitchen for ease of serving meals. Windows ensure natural lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with integrated appliances, designed for efficient workflow and proper ventilation using floor-to-ceiling windows.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window to allow maximum natural light in the entry area.
Expansive floor-to-ceiling windows aligned with Vastu for optimal sunlight and energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A generously sized bedroom with a dedicated spacious balcony. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide ample natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and a small balcony for relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with ample light from floor-to-ceiling windows and a balcony ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-planned bathroom adjacent to the bedrooms for convenience. Natural ventilation considered via window openings.

openings.description: Spacious balcony offering a private outdoor space with natural views, designed in accordance with Vastu and local norms.
Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring ample light and adherence to Vastu principles for energy flow.
